name: Traptrix Holeutea
effectText: You can activate this card the turn it was Set, by discarding 1 Normal Trap. Special Summon this card in Defense Position as a Normal Monster (Plant/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 400/DEF 2400). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Traptrix" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use 1 "Traptrix Holeutea" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
